welcome.title: Welcome to ZenCash!
welcome.description: This is your financial dashboard. Let's take a quick tour of the features.

stats.title: Financial Summary
stats.description: Here you can see your income, expenses, and balance for the selected month.

monthPicker.title: Filter by Month
monthPicker.description: Use this selector to navigate between months and view data from previous periods.

charts.title: Charts & Analytics
charts.description: Visualize your expenses by category, payment method, and the last 6 months trend.

import.title: Import Statement
import.description: Click here to import your bank statement in OFX format.

welcome.title: Categories
welcome.description: Manage your categories to better organize your financial transactions.

create.title: Create Category
create.description: Click here to create a new category with name, color, and type (income or expense).

grid.title: Categories List
grid.description: Here you see all your categories. Click the action icons to edit or delete.

welcome.title: Transactions
welcome.description: View and manage all your financial transactions.

filter.title: Filter by Period
filter.description: Select month and year to filter the displayed transactions.

import.title: Import Statement
import.description: Click here to import new transactions from your bank statement.

grid.title: Transactions List
grid.description: See your transactions with description, amount, category, and date. Click to edit.

welcome.title: Import OFX Statement
welcome.description: Import your transactions automatically from your bank statement.

info.title: OFX Format
info.description: The OFX file is exported from your bank's online banking.

dropzone.title: Upload Area
dropzone.description: Click or drag your OFX file here to upload.

steps.title: How It Works
steps.description: Follow these steps to successfully import your statement.
